Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People from diverse backgrounds and industries are coming together on social media urging the Government of AlboMP to raise the rates for those who receive JobSeeker Payment and Youth Allowance. There is a sense of urgency for the upcoming budget as many people struggle to cover basic needs. From politicians academics and business leaders to community advocates this unified coalition believes that keeping people on such low payments is cruel and ineffective.
